price: Na wale walio kufuru na wakazikanusha Ishara zetu, hao ndio watu wa Motoni.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
footnotes: Na walio mpinga Mwenyezi Mungu na Mitume wake, na wakazikanya dalili alizo wateremshia kuwa ni uwongofu wa kufikia Haki, ni wao peke yao wanao stahiki adhabu kali katika Jahannamu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā ulāika aṣḥābu al-jaḥīmi
